wikipedia_page.main: Simon Wilton Phipps MC (1921–2001) was a British Anglican bishop, who served as Bishop of Lincoln between 1974 and 1987.

response: * Simon Phipps (game designer) (born 1966), British game designer
* Simon Phipps (programmer), president of the Open Source Initiative
* Simon Phipps, conductor of the Swedish Chamber Choir
* Simon Phipps, lead singer of the band The Engineers
